word:
I have been shown that Satan's specious temptations will come to the workers in every mission, to the workers in every institution in our land, to 


                                   -299- 

encourage familiarity, the men with the women. I write with a distressed heart, that the women in this age, both married and unmarried, too frequently do not maintain the reserve that is necessary. They act like coquettes. They encourage the attentions of single and married men, and those who are weak in moral power will be ensnared.
